Text: Performance ReviewsSpst In the discussion to choose my reviewers for the PEP this year I was told to include individuals on the business side I chose you and Chris Gaskill as the primary business reviewers because of my work on Jaguar and the Weather Server as well as general support of the floor during the first four months of this year If you have any reservations or concerns or are just not interested in doing my review in addition to all the necessary reviews I understand completely please just let me know If you have any questions for me please call me or email me Thanks Marc Bir x
Weather ServerThe current status of the weather server can now be checked at Once the server is moved to production a new address will be provided Marc
